oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: Hank Cochran, Johnny Cash, Burl Ives, Jim Reeves, Charlie Walker, Ray Price, Buck Owens, and Warren Smith. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates. The tape is the second in a series of eight.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Sally Was a Good Ole Girl (Hank Cochran) -- (02:13) Busted (Johnny Cash) -- (04:25) Mary Ann Regrets [drops out] (Burl Ives) -- (07:54) The Blizzard (Jim Reeves) -- (11:09) Pick Me Up on Your Way Down (Charlie Walker) -- (13:29) Heartaches by the Number (Ray Price) -- (16:19) Excuse Me (I Think I've Got a Heartache) (Buck Owens) -- (18:38) I Don't Believe I'll Fall in Love Today (Warren Smith) -- (21:06) Foolin' Round (Buck Owens) -- (23:36) Call Me Mr. In-Between [features feedback] (Burl Ives) -- (26:09) Odds and Ends [features feedback] (Warren Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cochran, Hank; Cash, Johnny; Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003; Ives, Burl, 1909-1995; Reeves, Jim; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Price, Ray; Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Smith, Warren, 1933-1980;
